mapper.insert: insert into task (task_id, project_id, title, comment_id, start_date, close_date, status) values (task_seq.nextval, #{project_id}, #{title}, null, null, null, #{status})
insert into task_file (file_id, task_id, file_name, original_name) values (TASKFILE_SEQ.nextval, #{task_id}, #{file_name}, #{original_name})
insert into comments (comment_id, contents, writer, reg_date, task_id) values (comment_seq.nextval, #{contents}, #{writer}, sysdate, #{task_id})
mapper.update: update comments set contents = #{contents} where comment_id=#{comment_id}
